The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Study
For a list of all items and upgrades within the Construction skill, see Construction/Level up table.
Study
Released31 May 2006 (Update)
Icon
Construction level40
Cost50,000
Door layout
Study

A Study in a player-owned house is a room where the player can create magic tablets by using soft clay on a lectern (providing they have the runes for the tablet). It also holds the crystal ball that can be used to change the element of staves and battlestaves.

The study has three entrances/exits. This allows the player to use it as a straight room or a corner room.

Building a study requires level 40 Construction and 50,000.

There are 6 hotspots available:

  • Bookcase space
  • Crystal ball space
  • Globe space
  • Lectern space
  • Telescope space
  • Wall chart space

Contents

  • 1 Bookcase
  • 2 Crystal ball
  • 3 Globe
  • 4 Lectern
  • 5 Telescope
  • 6 Wall chart

Bookcase[edit | edit source]

Removing a bookcase does not destroy any of the books stored.

Level Bookcase Materials Experience Cost
4 Wooden bookcase Plank x4
Nails x4 		115 864 - 4,252[1]
29 Oak bookcase Oak plank x3 180 1,416
40 Mahogany bookcase Mahogany plank x3 420 6,612
  1. ↑ Cost changes depending on the type of nails used.
